entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
